item.title: Personals - Ari Juels
item.description: Today weâ€™ll be talking with Ari Juels. Juels is Co-Director of the Initiative for CryptoCurrencies and Contracts (IC3). He is also Chief Scientist at Chainlink Labs and a Professor in the Jacobs Technion-Cornell Institute at Cornell Tech. We’ll be talking about his work and what motivates him.
